metadata.description: Opportunities, career, personal growth, and social life

description.overview: Growth represents your external expansion - opportunities, career momentum, personal evolution, and social connections.
description.detailed: This group combines four growth dimensions: Opportunities (favorable timing and doors opening), Career (professional momentum and recognition), Growth (personal evolution and life transitions), and Social Life (friendships and community connections). Together they show your overall external growth and expansion. High scores mean doors are opening, career is flowing, you're evolving naturally, and social connections feel easy. Low scores suggest closed doors, career obstacles, resistance to change, or social isolation.

quiet.challenging: Doors feel closed - focus on internal foundation building
quiet.mixed: External activity is minimal - quiet preparation happening
quiet.harmonious: Peaceful stability - rest before next growth phase

mild.challenging: Progress is slow - be patient with the pace
mild.mixed: Gentle shifts happening - both stagnation and small movement
mild.harmonious: Easy progress flowing - doors opening naturally

moderate.challenging: Growth requires effort - push through obstacles
moderate.mixed: Active development in multiple areas - both progress and setbacks
moderate.harmonious: Natural expansion - career, opportunities, social life all flowing

high.challenging: Major growth demands - intense pressure to evolve
high.mixed: Rapid change in all directions - exciting but overwhelming
high.harmonious: Strong momentum - doors opening, career advancing, connections thriving

extreme.challenging: Life-altering transformation - massive growth or major obstacles
extreme.mixed: Total upheaval - simultaneous expansion and chaos
extreme.harmonious: Peak expansion - exceptional opportunities and recognition
